title: Draft solicitation for national security space launch services expected in early 2023
summary: Brig. Gen. Stephen Purdy said DoD has to approve the NSSL Phase 3 strategy before a draft request for proposals can be released

title: Space Force procurement chief criticizes over-engineered satellite programs
summary: Frank Calvelli: 'The old approach, the seven-year development contracts that we're doing, that has to change'

title: Next batch of OneWeb satellites arrive in India for launch
summary: OneWeb said Sept. 20 its latest batch of 36 broadband satellites has arrived in India ahead of plans to launch them next month on the country's largest rocket.

title: Soyuz MS-22 to loft two Russians and one American to ISS
summary: The Russian federal space agency, Roscosmos, is set to launch three people to the International Space Station (ISS) from Site 31/6 at the Baikonur Cosmodrome in Kazakhstan. Liftoff is scheduled for 13:54:49 UTC on Wednesday, Sept. 21.

title: NASA’s Stakeholder Collaborations Help Inform Moon to Mars Planning
summary: NASA Releases Revised Moon to Mars Objectives
